document_data.name: Namshita's clan
document_data.mainbody: '''Namshita's clan''' was one of the [[Thymari#Clans|clans]] of the nation of [[Tymanther]]. Unlike the other [[Thymari]] clans, Namshita's was composed of [[Mulan]]i instead of [[dragonborn]].
document_data.History:
As a reward for their help during the [[first Tymanther-Unther War]], in [[1487 DR]] [[Vanquisher]] [[Kallan]] allowed [[Namshita]] and her followers, all of them Mulani refugees that had fled from [[Unther]], to assemble their own clan, giving them full rights as citizens of Tymanther. but was supported by other clans, among them those that were grateful for Namshita's role in the liberation of their clan members that had being enslaved by [[Gilgeam]] after the return of Unther to Toril.

As of [[Hammer]] of [[1487 DR]], the official name of the clan, as well as their distinctive clan piercings, were yet to be decided.
document_data.Known members:
* [[Namshita]], the first matriarch of the clan.
* [[Amurri]], a Mulani warrior.
* [[Kirgal]], another Mulani warrior.
